Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Request

Interface Request

All Superinterfaces:
Convertible
All Known Implementing Classes:
BuyDevRequest, DiscardLeaderRequest, EndTurnRequest, InitialPlayersSetRequest, MarketRequest, MoveRequest, NewGameRequest, PlayLeaderRequest, PongRequest, ProduceRequest
public interface Request
extends Convertible
The interface used by all type of request the player could send. A request contains the information about of the action a player would like to do.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean canBePlayed​(Player player)
    Check if the Player's status satisfied all the requirements needed to handle the request he sent.
    Update createUpdate​(Player player, Game game)
    According to the modifies bring to the model by the request, this method create the relative Update that will send to the players client side.
    int getGameID()
    Gets the Game'IdD which received the request.
    java.lang.String getPlayerID()
    Gets the player's ID who sent the request.
    TurnState handle​(Player curr, Game game)
    Handle the request sent by the Player modifying his status on the server according to what he said wants to do.
    boolean validRequest​(java.util.ArrayList<TurnState> turnStates)
    Check if the Player who sent the request can do the actions he wants in this moment of his turn and in this moment of the Game.

    Methods inherited from interface it.polimi.ingsw.Convertible

    getClassName

  • Method Details

    • handle

      TurnState handle​(Player curr, Game game)
      Handle the request sent by the Player modifying his status on the server according to what he said wants to do.
      Parameters:
      curr - the curr
      game - the game
      Returns:
      the action just done. Used by the Game so can have all the information about of what every Player did in his turn.

    • validRequest

      boolean validRequest​(java.util.ArrayList<TurnState> turnStates)
      Check if the Player who sent the request can do the actions he wants in this moment of his turn and in this moment of the Game.
      Parameters:
      turnStates - the turn states
      Returns:
      true if he can, false otherwise.

    • canBePlayed

      boolean canBePlayed​(Player player)
      Check if the Player's status satisfied all the requirements needed to handle the request he sent.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player who sent the request.
      Returns:
      true if the player satisfied all the requirements, false otherwise.

    • createUpdate

      Update createUpdate​(Player player, Game game)
      According to the modifies bring to the model by the request, this method create the relative Update that will send to the players client side.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player who sent this request.
      game - the Game who received the request reference.
      Returns:
      the update

    • getPlayerID

      java.lang.String getPlayerID()
      Gets the player's ID who sent the request.
      Returns:
      the player's ID.

    • getGameID

      int getGameID()
      Gets the Game'IdD which received the request.
      Returns:
      the game's ID.
